patterns: I want to log blood pressure results
I dont know what is arduino?
responses: Arduino is a microcontroller which has analog and digital pins. It has one built in led which glows if you turn on pin 13. If the arduino is powered up the on led will glow green. Analog pins are pins which are the pins that only supports analog divices. It gives a value from 0 to 1023. Digital pins are pins that can only be used for digital divises and it can only turn on and off and some pins which are pwm can give variable power. Please vist https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arduino_Uno for more info..
